H0.text: What did Pickles find in 1966. A valuable coin

H1.text: What did Pickles find in 1966. A rare book

H2.text: What did Pickles find in 1966. A famous painting

H3.text: What did Pickles find in 1966. The Jules Rimet Trophy/World Cup

A4.text: the Jules Rimet trophy was stolen from an exhibition display... It was later discovered wrapped in newspaper as the dog sniffed under some bushes in London

A5.text: Prior to the tournament, the Jules Rimet trophy was stolen, but was recovered by a dog named Pickles four months before the tournament began
